question: can you tell me something about me briefly.
answer: Swarnima Dwivedi is a female Indian national, born on 10/02/1999, who identifies as Hindu and knows Hindi and English. She lives in Vijay Nagar (Indore) with the pincode 452010. Her mobile number is 8085599728 and her email address is Swarnadwivedi1999@gmail.com. She completed her Bachelor of Science in 2019 from an unspecified university, where she was a Dean's Lister for 6 semesters. Prior to that, she attended schooling in Nagod. Her career objective is to join a team where she can learn, contribute, and enjoy her work while adding value to the organization. She is interested in teaching, reading & writing, exploring something new, traveling, and mountain climbing. Some of her skills include problem solving, good listening, leadership, organization, time management, and critical thinking.
